channel.title: drought response on funPlantGenes

item.title: AhCSD2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AhCSD2 Gene Name: Cu/Zn-SOD Genome: Species: Arachis hypogaea Functional Descriptions: We obtained the full-length DNA of the chloroplast Cu/Zn-SOD gene (AhCSD2) from 11 allotetraploid cultivars and 5 diploid wild species in peanut.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnaPP2C37 Gene Name: Protein phosphatases type 2C 37 Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: BnaPP2C37 Encodes a Nuclear and Cytoplasmic Phosphatase and Its Expression Is Induced by ABA and Drought Stress Treatments.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.09G145700 Gene Symbol: GmDREB1D Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Dt2 functions as a direct repressor of the putative drought-responsive transcription factor gene GmDREB1D.

item.title: GmDREB3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmDREB3 Gene Name: dehydration-responsive element binding protein 3 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Cold-induced modulation and functional analyses of the DRE-binding transcription factor gene, GmDREB3, in soybean.

item.title: GmDRF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.02G085900 Gene Symbol: GmDRF1 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmDRF1/2 physically bind to the promoter of GmPrx16 and promote its expression, and drought stress induces the expression of GmDRF1/2, thereby influencing the accumulation of ROS and multiple stress response pathways.

item.title: GmDRF2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.07G171200 Gene Symbol: GmDRF2 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmDRF1/2 physically bind to the promoter of GmPrx16 and promote its expression, and drought stress induces the expression of GmDRF1/2, thereby influencing the accumulation of ROS and multiple stress response pathways.

item.title: GmERF3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmERF3 Gene Name: EREBP/AP2 transcription factor Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of the soybean GmERF3 gene, an AP2/ERF type transcription factor for increased tolerances to salt, drought, and diseases in transgenic tobacco.

item.title: GmLHY1a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.16G017400 Gene Symbol: GmLHY1a Gene Name: LATE ELONGATED HYPOCOTYL 1 Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Two homologous LHY pairs negatively control soybean drought tolerance by repressing the abscisic acid responses.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.16G017400 Gene Symbol: GmLHY1a Gene Name: LATE ELONGATED HYPOCOTYL 1 Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Two homologous LHY pairs negatively control soybean drought tolerance by repressing the abscisic acid responses.

item.title: GmPUB21
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.02G242900 Gene Symbol: GmPUB21 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: We conclude that GmPUB21 and GmDi19-5 collaborate to regulate drought and salinity tolerance via an ABA-dependent pathway.

item.title: GmWRKY54
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.10g011300 Gene Symbol: GmWRKY54 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmWRKY54 improves drought tolerance through activating genes in abscisic acid and Ca2+ signaling pathways in transgenic soybean.

item.title: HvAKT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvAKT1 Gene Name: Inwardly rectifying K+ channel 1 Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of HvAKT1 improves drought tolerance in barley by regulating root ion homeostasis and ROS and NO signaling.

item.title: HvAKT2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvAKT2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of HvAKT2 and HvHAK1 enhanced K+ uptake and H+ homoeostasis leading to drought tolerance in these transgenic lines.

item.title: HvHAK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvHAK1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of HvAKT2 and HvHAK1 enhanced K+ uptake and H+ homoeostasis leading to drought tolerance in these transgenic lines.

item.title: PeJAZ2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.006G139400 Gene Symbol: PeJAZ2 Gene Name: JASMONATE ZIM-domain protein 2 Genome: Species: Populus euphratica Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of PeJAZ2 in poplar notably increased water deficit tolerance and WUE in both severe and mild drought stress by regulating ABA signaling rather than ABA synthesis.

item.title: PtoERF15

item.title: PtoMYC2b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Potri.003G092200 Gene Symbol: PtoMYC2b Gene Name: Genome: Species: Populus tomentosa Functional Descriptions: Here, we identified and characterized an osmotic stress-induced ETHYLENE RESPONSE FACTOR 15 (PtoERF15) and its target, PtoMYC2b, which was involved in mediating vessel size, density, and cell wall thickness in response to drought in Populus tomentosa.
